knimeNode.name: PSMSetAllTopidentificationsForFDR
knimeNode.shortDescription: Sets the number of top identifications per spectrum used for all further FDR calculations, 0 meaning all identifications are used.

intro.p: Sets the number of top identifications per spectrum used for all further FDR calculations, 0 meaning all identifications are used.

fullDescription.option: Additional Java settings, like giving Java a big enough amount of memory.

ports.inPort: Path to the file, which contains the build pipeline until this step. [xml]
ports.outPort: Path to the file, which will contain the pipeline with added filters. [xml]

views.view: The text sent to standard out during the execution of PSMSetAllTopidentificationsForFDR.

The text sent to standard error during the execution of PSMSetAllTopidentificationsForFDR. (If it appears in gray, it's the output of a previously failing run which is preserved for your trouble shooting.)
